name: nativescript-locate-address
description: Opening Native Mapping App from your Mobile {N} App to locate address.

scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios --device "iPhone 7"
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-locate-address && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
